title: 89: Cleat Chasing Class ft. Jay Cutler
description:
She got a few athletes on speed dial....

Today we are diving into uncharted territory - move over Erin Andrews, welcome Sofia Franklyn! Today we are joined by former NFL quarterback, Jay Cutler. Sloots, if you’re like Sofia and know nothing about sports, you may recognize Jay from E! TV show, Very Cavallari. Recording from Nashville, Tennessee, Sofia gets the full story of Jay Cutler and his life before, during, and after the NFL - including the reality BEHIND filming a reality TV show…anddd of course some tips for the Sloots about how they too can bag a professional athlete of their own. Sofia then invites Jay to join her for his first ever SOS (Save Our Sloots) session where he was brutally honest. Finally, Jay opens up about his divorce from Kristen Cavallari, shutting down rumors and explaining the breakup from his perspective. 


Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
